text: The wheels on the Tow Truck goes round and round..

Round and round,
Round and round.
The wheels on the Tow Truck goes round and round..
All through the town.
The Boom on the Tow Truck goes up and down..

Up and down..
up and down..
The Boom on the Tow Truck goes up and down..
All through the town.
The wipers on the Tow Truck goes Swish,swish,swish

Swish,swish,swish
Swish,swish,swish
The wipers on the Tow Truck goes Swish,swish,swish
All through the town.
The horn on the Tow Truck goes Beep, beep beep..

Beep, beep, beep
Beep, beep, beep
The horn on the Tow Truck goes Beep, beep beep...
All through the town.
The windows on the Tow Truck goes up and down,

Up and down..
up and down..
The windows on the Tow Truck goes up and down,
All through the town.
